import sys 

T = int(raw_input())

while T > 0:
    N = int(raw_input())
    ans = 0
    prev = None
    #l = map(int, raw_input().split())
    l = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
 
    for i in range(N):
        curr = l[i]
        if i>0 and curr>prev:
            ans += curr-prev
            curr = prev 
        prev = curr
    print ans
            
    T -= 1
